The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Wednesday 

Yellow Lentil Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (celery, tomato, yellow lentils, carrot, white onion, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Rice Spaghetti with Shiitake Mushroom  – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (rice spaghetti, shiitake mushroom, champinion mushroom, red bell pepper, red onion, tomato, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Seeds Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 50 g (sun flower seeds, pumpkin seeds, flaxseed, dehydrated tomatoes, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Chocolate, Vanilla and Caramel Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (peanuts, cocoa butter, alkaline cocoa, guarana, mesquite, cashews, almonds, orange, vanilla, coconut flakes, unfiltered honey)
